title: 108: Sonia Weber: Riding the Energy
itunes:title: 108: Sonia Weber: Riding the Energy
description:
This week Jeremy interviews Sonia Weber of Alien Boy

On this episode Sonia and Jeremy talk Portland OR, the pop music to pop punk pipeline, going to a rock camp, being a music teacher, drumming in several bands, traveling to California to record with Alex Estrada, the genesis of Alien Boy and getting the motivation to front a band, having music on vinyl the first time, signing to Get Better Records, recording Don’t Know What I Am, and so much more! 

SUBSCRIBE TO THE PATREON to hear a bonus episode where Sonia answered questions that were submitted by subscribers!

Follow the show on INSTAGRAM and TWITTER

Want some First Ever Podcast merch? Click here!
